name: Azurmane
description: Like  Univolt, it was once believed to be connected to the Thunder God.As faith in  Univolt waned, Azurmane was deemed the God's true envoy.Even so, time reduced both to the same lowly status of ordinary workhorses.

partner_skill.name: Plasma Dash
partner_skill.description: Can be ridden.Also allows dashing in the air and moving at high speed.

active_skills.name: Spark Blast
active_skills.description:
Releases lightning orbs in a fan shape, 
spreading as they travel.

active_skills.name: Shockwave
active_skills.description:
Quickly discharges electricity,
shocking those around it.

active_skills.name: Lightning Streak
active_skills.description:
Generates a lightning bolt
that moves forward in a line.

active_skills.name: TriSpark
active_skills.description:
A high-speed lightning ball that flies in a straight line.
Simultaneously fires slow lightning balls that track the enemy.

active_skills.name: All Range Thunder
active_skills.description:
Generates lightning strikes that travel 
in a straight line in all directions.

active_skills.name: Thunder Rail
active_skills.description:
Charge the power of lightning to the limit
and fires multiple simultaneous electric shocks at the enemy.

active_skills.name: Bolt Blink
active_skills.description:
Azurmane's exclusive skill.
Moves with the speed of lightning, engulfing everything in its path.
